description.component:
React 19 Error Boundary that captures errors in the component tree and shows a friendly UI instead of crashing the app.

## Features
- Polished, friendly error UI
- Retry button
- Technical details (dev only)
- Automatic error logging
- Support for custom fallbacks
description.interactive: Interactive demo. Click 'Trigger Error' to see the ErrorBoundary in action.
description.production: Production view without technical details. Only shows the friendly message.
description.fallbackFunction: Fallback as a function that receives the error and reset callback to fully customize the UI.

buggy.errorMessage: This is a test error to demonstrate the ErrorBoundary!
